param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: POST
method.doc: This web service will list the details of a given protected object. The response will include all of the standard details found in a pdadmin object show command along with the details of any attached and/or effective POP.

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator name.

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator password.

param.name: admin_domain
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administration domain. The 'Default' domain will be used if this parameter is not supplied.

param.name: object
param.doc: The name of the object space or protected object which is the level to search in.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the protected object

param.name: description
param.doc: The description attached to the protected object.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of the protected object.

param.name: is_policy_attachable
param.doc: Whether or not policy can be attached to this protected object.

param.name: extended_attributes
param.doc: An array of hashes containing the name and value of any extended attributes attached to this protected object.

param.name: attached_acl
param.doc: The acl (if any) that is attached to this object.

param.name: attached_pop
param.doc: The pop (if any) that is attached to this object.

param.name: attached_authzrule
param.doc: The name of the authorization rule that is attached to this protected object.

param.name: effective_extended_attributes
param.doc: An array of hashes containing the name and value of any extended attributes inherited by this protected object.

param.name: effective_acl
param.doc: The acl that is effective for this object (attached or inherited).

param.name: effective_pop
param.doc: The pop (if any) that is effective for this object (attached or inherited).

param.name: effective_authzrule
param.doc: The name of the authorization rule that is effective for this protected object (attached or inherited).

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the extended attribute

param.name: value
param.doc: The value of the extended attribute

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the POP

param.name: description
param.doc: The description attached to the POP

param.name: warning
param.doc: The warning settings for this POP

param.name: audit_level
param.doc: The audit level set for this POP

param.name: quality_of_protection
param.doc: The quality of protection settings for this POP

param.name: time_of_day_access
param.doc: The time of day access settings for this POP

param.name: ip_endpoint_authentication_method_policy
param.doc: The IP endpoint authentication method policy for this POP

param.name: extended_attributes
param.doc: An array of hashes containing the name and value of any extended attributes attached to this POP.

param.name: authlevel
param.doc: The authentication level

param.name: network
param.doc: The network
